resources.string: This application can be used to track your fitness workouts. For Cardio records, users can track duration, date and time. \nFor strength records: Reps, Sets, date and time.

To begin using app, select either of the two tabs at the top of the screen to select what kind of workout you will be focusing on. Each tab will display a list of available workouts to track.The strength tab also includes multiple choices for each target muscle area.\n\nTo add a new record,click the plus button in the bottom right hand corner of the screen and fill out all of the fields and select done. To edit any records, simply select and of the items from the list and a similarly page will appear to make any changes to the entry. Select Update to update the entry, or delete to remove it from the database.
